nodes.text: Poltroon was a Lambda-class T-4a shuttle used by a salvage yard during the Galactic Civil War.

The platform was harbouring a Rebel spy that was tracked by the Galactic Empire who wanted the spy alive. The platform was also responsible for hiding fugitives and smugglers all of which had Corellian YT-1300 transports that were modified for extra speed. The Poltroon was tasked in repairing the IPV-1 System Patrol Craft Nemzet and the BFF-1 bulk freighter Renspecs. Whether the shuttle managed to do this is unclear, but what was clear was that the shuttle destroyed in the skirmish. The events regarding AZ 77 were recorded for the Combat chamber to train future pilots such as Maarek Stele.
